alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Centennial Mountains, Island Park (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 3:31PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Thunderstorms working east along the Centennial Mountains toward Island Park and Henrys Lake the evening... At 327 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along the Montana border working east at 15 mph toward Island Park and Henrys Lake. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 30 mph and occasional lighting. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects and create difficult boating conditions through the evening. Locations impacted include... Henrys Lake, Island Park Village, Shotgun Village, Ponds Lodge, Macks Inn, Last Chance, Island Park Reservoir, Red Rock Pass, Sheridan Reservoir, Big Springs, and Targhee Pass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If on or near Island Park Reservoir or Henrys Lake, now may be a good time to head to shore. Remember, lightning can strike out to 10 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.

area.areaDesc: Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Centennial Mountains, Island Park
